name: Pumpkin Pie Chai Latte
preparation: Boil sugar, water and Pumpkin Pie Spice in a Multipurpose Pot - 8 cup over high heat for 1 minute, whisking frequently. Remove from heat and stir in vanilla extract.
Warm milk in microwave on high for 1 minute, or until steamy. Froth in a milk frother until frothy.
Pour tea into cups. Stir 1 tbsp syrup into each cup and refrigerate remaining for another day. Pour in frothed milk and serve.
